mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dayTime, '%Y-%m') AS generateTime, SUM(dayCount) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dayTime, COUNT(1) AS dayCount FROM `balance_lianbi_active_info` GROUP BY dayTime HAVING dayTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) b GROUP BY generateTime HAVING generateTime > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER} MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) ORDER BY generateTime DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%y-%m-%d') AS generateTime, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM `balance_lianbi_active_info` GROUP BY generateTime HAVING generateTime >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY),'%y-%m-%d') AND generateTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d') ORDER BY generateTime DESC

SELECT province AS province, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT
IF ( POSITION('自治区' IN province) > 0, LEFT ( province, LOCATE('自治区', province) - 1 ), province ) AS province, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createDay FROM balance_lianbi_active_info )b WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createDay, '%Y-%m') > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER } MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) AND createDay < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND LENGTH(province) > 0 AND province <> 'no_location' AND province <> 'Reserved Address' GROUP BY province ORDER BY generateCount DESC LIMIT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT province AS province, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dayTime, IF ( POSITION('自治区' IN province)>0, LEFT ( province, LOCATE('自治区', province) - 1 ), province ) AS province FROM balance_lianbi_active_info HAVING dayTime >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND dayTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) b WHERE LENGTH(province) > 0 AND province <> 'no_location' AND province <> 'Reserved Address' GROUP BY province ORDER BY generateCount DESC LIMIT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT country AS activeCountry, province AS activeProvince, city AS activeCity, county AS activeCounty, COUNT(1) AS activated FROM `balance_lianbi_active_info` WHERE mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT phone_number AS phoneNumber, province AS activeProvince, country AS activeCountry, county AS activeCounty, COUNT(1) AS activated, city AS activeCity, k_code AS kCode, mac AS mac, sn AS sn, ip AS ip FROM `balance_lianbi_active_info` WHERE sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
